title: deeplabcut.triangulate IndexError: list index out of range
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

Hello Guys, 

I have been to do 3D reconstruction. everytime i do the calibration and try to do the triangulation i get the following error : 
IndexError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
~\AppData\Local\Temp/ipykernel_16928/4266880907.py in <module>
----> 1 deeplabcut.triangulate(config_path3d, 'C:\\Users\\bilel\\Desktop\\Everything\\Bilel Projects\\deeplabcut\\data\\trials\\synco',videotype='.mp4', filterpredictions=False)

~\miniconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_3d\triangulation.py in triangulate(config, video_path, videotype, filterpredictions, filtertype, gputouse, destfolder, save_as_csv)
    302                 stereomatrix,
    303                 path_stereo_file,
--> 304             ) = undistort_points(
    305                 config, dataname, str(cam_names[0] + "-" + cam_names[1])
    306             )

~\miniconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_3d\triangulation.py in undistort_points(config, dataframe, camera_pair)
    453     if True:
    454         # Create an empty dataFrame to store the undistorted 2d coordinates and likelihood
--> 455         dataframe_cam1 = pd.read_hdf(dataframe[0])
    456         dataframe_cam2 = pd.read_hdf(dataframe[1])
    457         scorer_cam1 = dataframe_cam1.columns.get_level_values(0)[0]

IndexError: list index out of range

I have changed the cameras a,d re-did the entire process so many times , changed the alpha values but it always come down to this error 
I would have to note that i have some parts of the undistorted frames missing (due to alpha values changing i presume)

Any help would be appreciated

Thanks you in advance 


### Operating System

Windows 10

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version 2.2

### DeepLabCut mode

3d

### Device type

gpu nvidia rtx 2060

### Steps To Reproduce
```
# Project definitions (do not edit)
Task: AfterTrain
scorer: Billy
date: Oct8
# Project path (change when moving around)
project_path: C:\Users\bilel\Desktop\Everything\Bilel Projects\deeplabcut\AfterTrain-Billy-2021-10-08-3d

# Plotting configuration
skeleton:     # Note that the pairs must be defined, as you want them linked!
- - head
  - chest
- - chest
  - core
- - chest
  - leftshoulder
- - chest
  - rightshoulder
- - rightshoulder
  - rightelbow
- - rightelbow
  - rightwrist
- - leftshoulder
  - leftelbow
- - leftelbow
  - leftwrist
- - core
  - leftknee
- - core
  - rightknee
- - rightknee
  - rightfoot
- - leftknee
  - leftfoot

skeleton_color: black
pcutoff: 0.4
colormap: jet
dotsize: 15
alphaValue: 0.8
markerType: '*'
markerColor: r

# Number of cameras, camera names, path of the config files, shuffle index and trainingsetindex used to analyze videos:
num_cameras: 2
camera_names:
- camera-1
- camera-2
scorername_3d: BillyWilly # Enter the scorer name for the 3D output
bodyparts:
- head
- chest
- leftwrist
- rightwrist
- leftshoulder
- rightshoulder
- leftelbow
- rightelbow
- core
- leftknee
- rightknee
- leftfoot
- rightfoot

trainingsetindex_camera-1: 0
trainingsetindex_camera-2: 0
config_file_camera-1: C:\Users\bilel\Desktop\Everything\Bilel Projects\deeplabcut\Training1-Billy-2021-10-12\config.yaml
config_file_camera-2: C:\Users\bilel\Desktop\Everything\Bilel Projects\deeplabcut\Training1-Billy-2021-10-12\config.yaml
shuffle_camera-1: 1
shuffle_camera-2: 1
```

### Relevant log output

_No response_
